body:
What makes you think the headset is the problem?

The log you posted seems to me to just be information, and not indicate a problem!?

It is the problem with the headset IN COMBINATION with Mumble in WASAPI mode, 
I believe something is going wrong when mumble opens the device, and the effect is that nothing related to audio works. 

This only happens for Mumble, and only when using WASAPI, as it works fine for DirectInput (XP mode), as well as for other programs.

Mumble also works fine on other sound devices in my system.

I've tried it on my Win8 System in WASAPI Mode with the following headsets

Logitech H600 - Don't work
Logitech H330 - Don't work
Logitech H390 - Works

If i set Mumble to Vista Compability and therefore turn the Mode to DirectSound all three of them work fine.
